text: Hargiz gūştho va xunhoi qurʙonijon ʙa Alloh namerasad, cunki Alloh ʙenijoz va loiqi sitoiş ast, ʙalki parhezgorii şumo, (ja'ne ixlosu nijati şumo) ʙa Ū merasad. Hamcunin onhoro ʙarojaton musaxxar namud, to Allohro ʙa xotiri on, ki hidojataton kardaast, ʙa ʙuzurgī jod kuned. Va nekūkoronro muƶda ʙideh
